channel.title: Crash to desktop when riding the train after launch the missile in the chapter On a Rail
channel.description:
I bought the game this saturday and couldn't finish On a Rail beacause of this problem. I don't know how to fix it and can't find the solution in google, so i came here in order to get some help from the developers. I hope someone can lend me a hand with this so i can still playing this awsome remake. Thanks.
[url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/4vckhy272yy677q/crash_bms.exe_20151226190924_1.dmp?dl=0[/url]
